description: Galaxy Science Fiction, Volume 4, Number 1; April 1952. Published by The Galaxy Publishing Corporation, 421 Hudson Street, New York 14, New York. Dimensions are 5 1/4" width by 7 3/8" Height by 5/16" thickness and weight 115grams, 164 pages. Copyright was issued in 1952, but no renewal was recorded, this work is Public Domain under Rule 6 of the Copyright Statutes of the United States. Etext created by Gerard Arthus. The pages for the story 'Ticket to Anywhere' by Damon Knight have been deleted from the files since the Copyright was renewed; this author's work will not be displayed due to irrational copyright statutes.
